remarks: Re-derivation of ~ axc4 from ~ axc5c4c711 .  Note that only propositional calculus is required for the re-derivation.  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 14-Jul-2011.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axc5c4c711toc4 $p |- ( A. x ( A. x ph -> ps ) -> ( A. x ph -> A. x ps ) ) $.
